name: Create Zendesk Sunshine profiles from new Microsoft 365 Excel worksheet rows
description: Every time a row is added in your Microsoft 365 Excel, Make will create a Zendesk Sunshine profile of it. We have created a (sample worksheet)[https://dnu-my.sharepoint.com/:x:/g/personal/ivanov_d_donnu_edu_ua1/EY3Ao8tUQaJAt-IoSI480NEBtf9jVLZ5sVoTsSFaMlF5kw?e=yTgbi3] for you to use it as a reference.
